RACE.RACE_TEXT: LQHBA Louisiana Million Futurity Trial EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 91. Futurity Trial Purse 10000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISANA BRED TWO YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES WHICH HAVE BEEN NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE FOR THE 2023 LQHBA MILLION FUTURITY. WEIGHT: 124 lbs. All entry payments must be on account with the horsemen's bookkeeper prior to 10:30 a.m. on the m orning of entries.(*All horse nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by the LQHBA. Refer to www.lqhba.com or www.evangelinedowns.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOZTILE TAKEOVER dueled,wore down foe. GRAND FEATURE duel, clearly 2nd best. RACY BLOOD restless gate,chased. JESS ILLUSION broke in, bump. SHEZA SAN LORENZO bump start, evenly. SEPERATE FIRE little impact rail. TDZ PERRYSROYALPAIN remained back. SUPER GREMLIN bump break, no bid. JRS HICLASS CARTEL brk out,bump,traffic.

ENTRY.NAME: Hoztile Takeover
ENTRY.OWNER: Kretschmer Mackenzie and Castellanos Luis Armando

JESSAH CERVZA bother,bmp,st'd midway. IMA POWERFUL JAMMER tight,jostled midway. REAL WILD CARTEL crowdced midway.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE KNOCKOUT POWER steady drive outside. HELL OF A VIEW early bobble,no match. SEPERATE EM FAST came in early,best rst. MAXIN OUT GAINS early bother, rallied. SIPP OF CORONA lacked needed bid. COMMANDEER weakened bit rail. EAGLE WITHANATTITUDE broke thru gate. ONE SWEET ROOTBEER came out early,trailed.
